name: Miscellaneous
notes: Representative subsystem for miscellaneous reactions that do not fit into any category (e.g., specie protonation/deprotatation/equilibration reactions)

name: Phenylalanine, tyrosine and tryptophan metabolism
notes: Merged KEGG pathways into one representative subsystem.

name: Pseudoreactions
notes: Representative subsystem for all exchanges, sinks, and demands (a.k.a. reactions added specifically for modeling purposes)

name: Sulfur metabolism
notes: Categorized as energy metabolism in KEGG, but serves as reactive species in the context of RBCs

name: Transport, extracellular
notes: Representative subsystem for all transport reactions across the plasma membrane. In HumanGEM (v1.18.0), known as "Transport Reactions" and includes all transport reactions.
